text.section: The county board shall hold an annual meeting on the first Monday in December to elect a chair and vice chair from among its members.

section.section:
Except as otherwise provided in paragraph (2) of this subsection, the affirmative vote of the members of the county board for the passage of a motion by the county board shall be:
Six members when the student member is voting; or
Five members when the student member is not voting.

When there are two or more vacancies on the county board, the affirmative vote of the members of the county board for the passage of a motion by the board shall be:
Five members when the student member is voting; or
Four members when the student member is not voting.
